alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:40AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN LEWIS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 538 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms with torrential rainfall 8 miles southeast of Barnes Corners, or 20 miles southeast of Watertown, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall and wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water in poor drainage or low lying areas. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lowville, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Watson, Martinsburg, Copenhagen, Castorland, Bellwood, and Rector. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
